nodes.text: Kamar was a dry and arid planet located in Wild Space near the Corporate Sector, home to the insectoid Kamarian species and the howlrunner. It had deserts and mountains across its surface that scorched under the hot-white sun. Various plant life such as the miser-plant, barrel-scrub, and sting-brush sprouted up.
Other creatures native to Kamar included digworms, stingworms, bloodsniffers, and nightswifts.

In the year 3668 BBY, the Zabrak female Akaavi Spar was born on Kamar.
Roughly around the same time, a spacebattle took place above Kamara and consequently, several valuable shipwrecks drifted in the orbit around Kamar and were slowly being pulled to the planet's surface.
